Academia.name: Academia
Academia.description: Academia is a platform for academics to share research papers.

AcademicJournals.name: Academic Journals
AcademicJournals.description: Academic Journals is a broad-based publisher of peer-reviewed open access journals.

AfricanJournalOnline.name: African Journal Online
AfricanJournalOnline.description: African Journals OnLine (AJOL) is the world's largest online library of peer-reviewed, African-published scholarly journals.

AmericanSocietyOfCivilEngineers.name: American Society of Civil Engineers
AmericanSocietyOfCivilEngineers.description: ASCE Library is a comprehensive online tool for locating articles of interest across all disciplines of civil engineering.

Base.name: Base
Base.description: BASE is one of the world's most voluminous search engines especially for academic open access web resources.

Bibsonomy.name: Bibsonomy
Bibsonomy.description: BibSonomy is a system for sharing bookmarks and lists of literature.

CollectionOfComputerScienceBibliographie.name: The Collection of Computer Science Bibliographies
CollectionOfComputerScienceBibliographie.description: This is a collection of bibliographies of scientific literature in computer science from various sources, covering most aspects of computer science.

Core.name: Core
Core.description: CORE is a full-text, interdisciplinary, non-profit social repository designed to increase the impact of work in the Humanities.

Elsevier.name: Elsevier
Elsevier.description: Elsevier is a world-leading provider of information solutions that enhance the performance of science, health, and technology professionals.

GoogleScholar.name: Google Scholar
GoogleScholar.description: Google Scholar provides a simple way to broadly search for scholarly literature.

GreyGuide.name: Grey Guide
GreyGuide.description: GreyGuide is a primer on grey literature.

GreyLiteratureListOfGateways.name: Grey Literature â€“ List of Gateways
GreyLiteratureListOfGateways.description: This guide provides a list of gateways to grey literature.

GreyLiteratureStrategies.name: Grey Literature Strategies
GreyLiteratureStrategies.description: Grey Literature Strategies is a research project that aims to develop a comprehensive and systematic approach to the management of grey literature.

GreyNetInternational.name: GreyNet International
GreyNetInternational.description: GreyNet International is an organization that promotes the distribution, access, and preservation of grey literature.

HighWire.name: HighWire: Free Online Full-text Articles
HighWire.description: HighWire is a division of the Stanford University Libraries, which produces the online versions of high-impact, peer-reviewed journals and other scholarly content.

JournalGuide.name: Journal Guide
JournalGuide.description: Journal Guide is a free tool that helps researchers to evaluate scholarly journals.

JournalSeek.name: Journal Seek
JournalSeek.description: Journal Seek is the largest completely categorized database of freely available journal information available on the internet.

JSTOR.name: JSTOR
JSTOR.description: JSTOR is a digital library of academic journals, books, and primary sources.

LazyScholar.name: Lazy Scholar
LazyScholar.description: Lazy Scholar is a browser extension that helps you find free versions of academic articles.

LeibnizInformationCentreForScienceAndTec.name: Leibniz Information Centre For Science and Technology University Library
LeibnizInformationCentreForScienceAndTec.description: The Leibniz Information Centre for Science and Technology University Library (TIB) is the German National Library of Science and Technology.

MicrosoftAcademic.name: Microsoft Academic
MicrosoftAcademic.description: Microsoft Academic is a free public web search engine for academic publications and literature.

NRCResearchPress.name: NRC Research Press
NRCResearchPress.description: NRC Research Press is the publishing arm of the National Research Council of Canada.

OpenAccessScientificJournals.name: Open Access Scientific Journals
OpenAccessScientificJournals.description: Open Access Scientific Journals is a publisher of open access scientific journals.

OAmg.name: OA.mg
OAmg.description: OA.mg is a free service that helps you share your research with the world.

OpenGrey.name: Open Grey
OpenGrey.description: Open Grey is a multidisciplinary European database of grey literature.

TheOpenSyllabusProject.name: The Open Syllabus Project
TheOpenSyllabusProject.description: The Open Syllabus Project is an effort to make the intellectual judgment embedded in syllabi relevant to broader explorations of teaching, publishing, and intellectual history.

OxfordJournals.name: Oxford Journals
OxfordJournals.description: Oxford Journals is a division of Oxford University Press, which publishes high-quality, peer-reviewed journals.

PubMed.name: PubMed
PubMed.description: PubMed comprises more than 26 million citations for biomedical literature from MEDLINE, life science journals, and online books.

QuetzalSearch.name: Quetzal Search
QuetzalSearch.description: Quetzal Search is a search engine for academic papers and articles.

ResearchGate.name: Research Gate
ResearchGate.description: Research Gate is a professional network for scientists and researchers.

SAGEJournals.name: SAGE Journals
SAGEJournals.description: SAGE Journals is a leading international publisher of journals, books, and electronic media for academic, educational, and professional markets.

ScienceDirect.name: ScienceDirect
ScienceDirect.description: ScienceDirect is a leading full-text scientific database offering journal articles and book chapters from more than 2,500 peer-reviewed journals and more than 11,000 books.

SCIRP.name: SCIRP
SCIRP.description: Scientific Research Publishing is an academic publisher of open access journals.

Springer.name: Springer
Springer.description: Springer is a leading global scientific, technical, and medical portfolio, providing researchers in academia, scientific institutions, and corporate R&D departments with quality content through innovative information, products, and services.

ScienceDomain.name: ScienceDomain
ScienceDomain.description: Science Domain International is a new and promising publisher of open access, online, peer-reviewed journals.

SciencePublications.name: Science Publications
SciencePublications.description: Science Publications is an international publisher of open access journals.

TaylorFrancisOnline.name: Taylor & Francis Online
TaylorFrancisOnline.description: Taylor & Francis Online is the journal content platform for the Taylor & Francis Group.

Wiley.name: Wiley
Wiley.description: Wiley is a global provider of content and content-enabled workflow solutions in areas of scientific, technical, medical, and scholarly research; professional development; and education.

WorldDigitalLibrary.name: World Digital Library
WorldDigitalLibrary.description: The World Digital Library provides free access to manuscripts, rare books, maps, photographs, and other important cultural documents from all countries and cultures.

WorldScience.name: World Science
WorldScience.description: World Science is a global science gateway comprised of national and international scientific databases and portals.

Zetoc.name: Zetoc
Zetoc.description: Zetoc provides access to the British Library's Electronic Table of Contents of journal articles and conference papers.
